title: Black Yome ni Yoroshiku!
original_name: ブラック嫁によろしく！
sinopse:
Shinta, a normal high-schooler on his way to school, gets (yet again) into an accident, but instead of dying, he is saved by a girl wearing nothing but black. She says that she is a shinigami and has come to become his wife, as promised.

(Source: Batoto)
